author: Calle
post_text: March 12, 2020 at 1:00 PM#1Hey guys,I've been searching for a way to target the next cue in my selected cue list.I would like to make a macro to assign the fade of the next cue, same thing as:Assign fade (fade time) pleaseBut for the next cue.Cheers.

posts.post_text: March 12, 2020 at 6:36 PM#3Awesome! Thanks, it didn’t show up when I searched for “next cue”.Well well, cheers!

posts.author: Moe696
posts.post_text: March 13, 2020 at 7:19 PM#4The search function ignores words with three or less letters.Try searching for "dmx" - there will be no results.Same results for "cue", "usb" and other three letter keywords.

title: Target next cue
